title: Biden’s Partisan Pandemic History
sub_head: The President wastes another opportunity to lead on Covid.
body:
“When I was elected I said I would always be honest with you,” said President Joe Biden on Monday as he commenced a White House briefing on the latest Covid variant. Keeping this pledge has been a challenge for Mr. Biden, in part because he seems unable to make a case for his policies without resorting to false comparisons involving his predecessor.
Usually Mr. Biden’s whoppers involve his continuing effort to pretend that the economy was a wreck when he took office. Initially the whoppers were intended to justify his massive interventions in the marketplace. Now they help to obscure the fact that real GDP growth was faster and inflation was lower when he took office than they are today.
